first_para: Andrew Robert George Robathan (born 17 July 1951) is a British Conservative politician, who was a Member of Parliament (MP) for South Leicestershire (previously Blaby) in Leicestershire and government minister. In September 2014 he announced he would stand down at the 2015 general election.

full.extract: Andrew Robert George Robathan (born 17 July 1951) is a British Conservative politician, who was a Member of Parliament (MP) for South Leicestershire (previously Blaby) in Leicestershire and government minister. In September 2014 he announced he would stand down at the 2015 general election.
full.title: Andrew Robathan
